all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And when he shall prove himself faithful in all things that shall be entrusted unto his care, yea, even a few things, he shall be made ruler over many;
Doctrine and Covenants 124:113
Quote of the Day
"If you ever feel like you don’t quite fit in, please know that you are not alone."
Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
